title: DJ Screw Tapes&Recordings
description:
Hopefully this torrent is *FIXED*; the last one must have had an error which held uploads at 99.5% (sorry). 

This is a compilation of 33 Screw Tapes and Recordings. They are all authentic DJ Screw recordings; all have been transferred from tapes to mp3. If you&#039;ve ever heard a real Screw Tape, then you&#039;ll know that &#039;audio quality&#039; wasn&#039;t his forte. Enjoy and please seed.

Albums:
3 &#039;n the Mornin&#039;, Pt. 2
11-16-00 [Limited Edition]
100% Business (remastered)
All Work, No Play
Playaz Nite
Sentimental Value
The Greatest Hits
The Legend
